means: （使某物）燃烧，着火( kindle的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: There were neat piles of kindling wood against the wall.
sentence.Network_cn: 墙边整齐地放着几堆引火柴.

sentence.Network_en: " Coal and kindling all in the shed in the backyard. "
sentence.Network_cn: “ 煤,劈柴,都在后院小屋里. ”

sentence.Network_en: " I'll split kindling tomorrow, " he said over his thin ragged shoulder.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 明天我劈引火柴, ” 他回过头来又说,衬衣的肩部都磨薄磨破了.

entry.def: Kindling is small pieces of dry wood and other materials that you use to start a fire.

means.word_mean: 2. the act of setting on fire or catching fire
